availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

ab.bibl: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850); Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860); U.S., Find a Grave Index, 1600s-Current, “Robert Sims (1821-1870)” https://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GSln=sims&GSfn=robert&GSby=1840&GSbyrel=before&GSdyrel=all&GSst=19&GScntry=4&GSob=n&GRid=30871113&df=all& (Accessed February 11, 2017); National Archives and Records Administration (NARA); Washington, D.C.; Federal Mortality Census Schedules, 1850-1880, and Related Indexes, 1850-1880; Archive Collection: T655; Archive Roll Number: 17; Census Year: 1879; Census Place: Kentucky; Page: 1359
